snippet: Measures taken by the Chinese government sent American stocks higher for building materials, chemicals, aircraft, and construction and mining equipment.
abstract: United States stocks make their biggest gains in last two months following Chinese government's decision to stimulate its economy.
lead_paragraph: Measures taken by the Chinese government sent American stocks higher for building materials, chemicals, aircraft, and construction and mining equipment.

headline.main: Wall St. Sees Chinese Stimulus as a ‘Ray of Sunshine’
headline.print_headline: Wall St. Sees Chinese Stimulus as a ‘Ray of Sunshine’
